content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Dear Aziz Trabelsi,

Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I appreciate your interest in renting it.

Regarding the rental price, I would like to propose a monthly rate of 800 Euros. This is based on the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in the area.

I believe this price is fair and reasonable, and I am confident that it will attract a good tenant like yourself.

What do you think about this price? Are there any other factors that you would like to discuss before we reach an agreement?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. I will sign the lease agreement and give you the deposit of 2 months in advance. What is the next step?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Dear Aziz Trabelsi,

Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. I appreciate your prompt response and decision to sign the lease agreement.

The next step would be to finalize the lease agreement and arrange for the payment of the deposit. You will need to pay the deposit of 2 months in advance, which can be done by bank transfer or in person.

Once the deposit has been received and the lease agreement has been signed, you will be able to move into the apartment and start enjoying your new home.

I hope this process goes smoothly and that you have a great experience living in the apartment. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
